Dominique Gaillard graduated from Ecole Polytechnique in 1979. Ecole Nationale des Ponts et ChaussÃ©es and the Institut d’Administration des Entreprises, and holds a Master of Science from UC Berkeley.

Dominique Gaillard joined AXA Private Equity in 1997, where he manages LBO mid cap, small cap, expansion capital, co-investment and infrastructure activities as well as the development of direct funds activities in Eastern Europe. Previously he spent seven years with Charterhouse France, starting as Project Manager and progressing to a Director and member of the Executive Board. He began his career at PÃ©chiney.
